akron.areaDescription: Greater Akron area, the birthplace of Alcoholics Anonymous
akron.neighborhoods: Downtown, Highland Square, Firestone Park, Fairlawn, West Akron
akron.meetingHighlights: Akron is the birthplace of AA where Dr. Bob and Bill W. founded the fellowship in 1935. Dr. Bob's Home is a historic landmark.
akron.transitInfo: METRO RTA buses connect Akron neighborhoods; Akronâ€“Canton Airport (CAK) is nearby for regional flights.

cincinnati.neighborhoods: Downtown, Over-the-Rhine, Mount Adams, Hyde Park, Clifton, Northside
cincinnati.meetingHighlights: Large, historic AA community with prominent meetings in Over-the-Rhine and Clifton; regular speaker meetings and round-robin formats.
cincinnati.transitInfo: SORTA Metro buses serve the city and the Cincinnati Bell Connector streetcar runs in downtown; Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport (CVG) nearby.

cleveland.neighborhoods: Downtown, Ohio City, Tremont, Edgewater, University Circle, Little Italy
cleveland.meetingHighlights: A broad schedule of meetings across neighborhoods with notable groups in University Circle and Tremont; several speaker and traditions study meetings.
cleveland.transitInfo: Greater Cleveland RTA operates rail and bus lines across the city; Cleveland Hopkins International Airport (CLE) serves regional travel.

columbus.neighborhoods: Short North, German Village, Arena District, Clintonville, Victorian Village, Franklinton
columbus.meetingHighlights: Very active downtown and university-area meetings (OSU area), with many Big Book, step-study, and speaker meetings throughout the week.
columbus.transitInfo: Central Ohio Transit Authority (COTA) buses and CMAX rapid transit serve core neighborhoods; John Glenn Columbus International Airport (CMH) for longer travel.

toledo.neighborhoods: Downtown, Old West End, Warehouse District, South Toledo, North Toledo, Rossford
toledo.meetingHighlights: Active downtown groups with a mix of open and closed meetings; several evening speaker meetings and Spanish-language meetings in South Toledo.
toledo.transitInfo: Toledo Area Regional Transit Authority (TARTA) provides bus service across the city; Toledo Express Airport serves regional flights.

dayton.neighborhoods: Downtown, Oregon District, South Park, Wright-Dunbar, Oakwood, Kettering
dayton.meetingHighlights: Strong downtown and Oregon District meetings; active fellowship with military outreach to Wright-Patterson AFB.
dayton.transitInfo: Greater Dayton RTA buses serve the metro area; Dayton International Airport (DAY) offers regional flights.
